answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Jeffrey – I hope the following links are helpful:
Emeryville, CA - REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS EVALUATION OF FIRE SERVICE DELIVERY SYSTEM
http://www.ci.emeryville.ca.us/DocumentView.aspx?DID=1317 
Boulder, CO – Council Report re: Fire Department Operation and Management Assessment Report
http://www.bouldercolorado.gov/files/Fire/master_plan/Fire_memo_6_1_11.pdf 
Assessment of Dallas Fire Rescue Department
http://www.berkshireadvisors.com/uploads/Dallas%20Fire%20Final%20Report%20Vol%20I.pdf 
Potter Valley, CA - a fire services benefit assessment report
http://www.co.mendocino.ca.us/econdev/econdocs/pottervalley/Potter%20Valley%20Fire%20Assessment.pdf 
Fire Protection Program DOE - Fire Protection Assessment guide
http://www.hss.doe.gov/nuclearsafety/nfsp/fire/models/assess_guide.pdf 
Request for Proposal - Fire Protection and Life Safety Consulting Services
Judicial Council of California Administrative Office of the Courts
http://www.courts.ca.gov/documents/fireprot-rfp.pdf 
National Fire Protection Association Statistical Data
http://www.nfpa.org/itemDetail.asp?categoryID=2228&itemID=52449&URL=Research/Fire%20reports/&cookie_test=1
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Jeffrey Fiegenschuh
text:
Hi the City of Goodyear, AZ is looking an conducting a Fire Department Assessment.   For those communities that have conducted one in the past can you email me a scope of work you used for your RFPs?
Thanks,
Jeff Fiegenschuh
Deputy City Manager
title: Deputy City Manaer
